survey_name: AI-Powered Language Learning App Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered language learning apps to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and desired improvements.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered language learning app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered language learning app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in the app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in the app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use the app?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency intervals to avoid ambiguity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use the app?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How effective has the app been in improving your language skills?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How effective has the app been in improving your language skills?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to capture nuanced responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the app?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the app?

questions.question_text: How much are you willing to pay monthly for a premium version of the app?
questions.client_notes: Use clear price ranges to gauge willingness to pay.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How much are you willing to pay monthly for a premium version of the app?

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use to access the app?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for uncommon devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.
